body_html: @aselle Hi Andrew, I would love to help, but I am not sure if wrapping the for loop with a null checker would be correct since the logic of updateEnter() seems complicated. For the other two call sites of getContext(), I found that simple null checkers worked (lines 256-258 and 345-347 of tensorflow/core/grappler/costs/graph_properties.cc at commit 4432623).

body: @aselle Hi Andrew, I would love to help, but I am not sure if wrapping the for loop with a null checker would be correct since the logic of `updateEnter()` seems complicated. For the other two call sites of `getContext()`, I found that simple null checkers worked (lines 256-258 and 345-347 of tensorflow/core/grappler/costs/graph_properties.cc at commit 4432623).
